name: NSDatePickerCellDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of NSDatePickerCell objects.

items.name: func datePickerCell(NSDatePickerCell, validateProposedDateValue: AutoreleasingUnsafeMutablePointer<NSDate>, timeInterval: UnsafeMutablePointer<TimeInterval>?)
